title: DEFI&AIRDROP Token helped develop mint.club
body: First, I wrote an article about the Mint Club in COBAK, the largest coin community in Korea. 1. How to add BSC NETWORK https://cobak.co.kr/+UxfdciM 2. How to buy mint from Pencake Swap https://cobak.co.kr/+JnLqYFl 3. How to create tokens in mint.club yourself https://cobak.co.kr/+Ihabtaz In addition, airdrops were conducted to revitalize the mint ecosystem. (You can check it by going to MINT DEFI CLUB-announcment.) A total of 2 airdrops were carried out. For the first airdrop, 2AIRDROPs were given to those who submitted a survey among those who had more than 1 million mints. For the second airdrop, 10 airdrops were given to those who have more than 1000 GRANT. AIRDROP TOKEN will continue to perform random airdrops for holders in this way. Finally, DEFI TEAM participates in mini quiz every day, and 50% of the prize money is used to purchase DEFI, and 40% is used for development expenses. The remaining 10% will be donated to MINT.CLUB. Yesterday we donated 50% of the total prize money. METAMASK BSC WALLET 0x0fEc1A7b2a42050F7b92A679a731B983dd2e62A1
author: 0x0fEc1A7b2a42050F7b92A679a731B983dd2e62A1
